properties.verseOrder: v1 p1 c1 v2 p2 b1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
To the mountains that I face,
there's one name that’s higher
To the empires of our age,
there's one name that's greater

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jesus,
You're the name above all names
Over my fears, over the storms
I'm gonna sing that Jesus is Lord
And Jesus,
You’re the name above all names
Here in the night, then at the dawn
I’m gonna sing that Jesus is Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To the burden of my shame,
there's one name that’s higher
To the battles that still rage,
there's one name that's greater,

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Miracle making, city wall shaking
Prodigal chasing, Lazarus raising
Destiny waking, history changing
Powerful name of God

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
To the giants in my way,
there’s one name that's higher
To the evil that prevails
there's one name that's greater
There's one name that's greater

verse.name: p2
verse.lines:
To the doubts that steal my faith,
there's one name that’s higher
To the idols that enslave,
there's one name that's greater
There's one name that's greater
